summary: Struggling with a tragic past, a man with an urgent calling enlists two friends to help him swim the length of the Hudson River.
cast: Joseph Fiennes|Samantha Sherman|Pell James|Justin Kirk|Elizabeth Reaser|Amy Hargreaves|Martin Shakar|Avery Glymph|Chad Brigockas|Tom O'Rourke|John Rue|Douglas Odell|Seth Kanor|Mary Tyler Moore|Constance Barron|Michelle Trachtenberg|Nimo Gandhi|Maggie Brown|Perry Callahan
title: A contracorriente
